comment.author: 42264328@N00
comment._content: "Champ Clark" is James Beauchamp Clark (1850-1921), congressman, Speaker of the House (1911-1919).

comment.author: 36519414@N00
comment._content: Your photo is uploaded here : commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Image:The_Library_of_Congress_... -- Seen on your photo stream. (?)

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Champ Clark was Wilson's rival for the Democratic Presidential nomination in 1912.  Clark received the majority of the votes on the early ballots at the Democratic convention, but did not achieve the 2/3 that he needed to win.  Ultimately Clark faded and Wilson prevailed, but Clark was bitter over his defeat.
